model.models
Class ModelTextModule

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractListModel
      javax.swing.DefaultComboBoxModel
          model.models.Model
              model.models.ModelTextModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ComboBoxModel, javax.swing.ListModel, javax.swing.MutableComboBoxModel
public class ModelTextModule
extends Model

Class for the models which contains the text modules. It covers models for salutation, subject, closing, category and text. It can have different status, which depends on the chosen document types.

Author:
Antje Huber
See Also:
Serialized Form

private static interface ModelTextModule.InterfaceModelTextModule

          Inner class for chosen a document type letter or e-mail.

          Abstract class for text modules models for subject etc.
